name: Poule tournament
author: Stefan de Bruin

sections.description:
This tournament system can by used at the WK or the EK.
users could set there own prediction.
As admin you can create your own phases.
New in version 2.1.0 is that users can create their own subpoule

Features include:

  • a result/podium page
  • a dashboard widget with the top 3 podium
  • date time picker to set the correct start time of a match
  • users can create a subpoule

Scores:

  • match winnar correct 1 point
  • match score correct 2 points
  • penalty winnar correct 1 point

Translations
Send me the .po and .om files of your translation and I will add it in the next update.

Bootstrap:
You have to include bootstrap 3 for the frontend pages.

Coming soon

The next featers comming with the next updates
*No plans
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the folder and upload the files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/poule-tournament’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create pages with the following shortcodes [poule_official_result], [poule_my_prediction], [poule_podium], [poule_subpoules_home], [poule_thank_you]
  4. Go to Countries -> settings -> pages and set the correct page to the correct shortcode for the links
  5. Add the pages with the following shortcodes to the menu: [poule_official_result], [poule_my_prediction], [poule_podium]
sections.faq:
Create it automatic the matches?

Yes, but not the group matches

Scores:

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: Fix a activation bug. that by every activation create the pages.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Add a date time picker and add url security.
upgrade_notice.1.2: Delete many bugs and many new functions in the code. for more information about this update go to the changelog page
upgrade_notice.1.3: Delete a Bug in the activation that not add the phases of the tournament. A begin of a cronjob for the podium. a cronjob for 15 minutes. Last the bug for add bootstrap js/css files for the style
upgrade_notice.1.3.1: Sorry for this update. but in version 1.3 the activation was not deleted. Add the cronjob but this do nothing.
upgrade_notice.1.3.2: In this update many bugs are deleted. and add the new technique to create the podium. last the cronjob from the previous versions are deleted. and code optimization
upgrade_notice.2: In the update the admin pages has a new template. The settings for delete data are back and working, But the settings for the user podium are deleted. The hole plugin is testet in debug modus.
upgrade_notice.2.1.0: A new function in this version is that users cn create theri own subpoule
upgrade_notice.2.1.0.1: This version delete a bug in the update.
upgrade_notice.2.1.1: Now you can view the score for each single phase. Also The admin users can now view all the subpoules in wp-admin. Delete a style bug in the dashboard. Use the help tab in the admin.
upgrade_notice.2.2: A total new version. This version has a new admin menu and a custom post type. Also a new page added to the frontend for a thank you page. See the change log of this version for a full list of changes.
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.0.2: remove a bug in combination with PHP 5.3.3
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.1.2: Fix a bug that the system don't save your predcition
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.2: Fix some bug. Default value is now 0. Delete url bug
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.3: Change the settings for my prediction. Add the gravatar image to the podium. You have to check the settings afther the update
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.4: Bug fixes for the other phases. specific for the penalties
upgrade_notice.2.2.0.5: Bug fix for save save your prediction in the phases whit penalties enabled.
